docs.snippet: Denver Broncos coach Gary Kubiak has named Trevor Siemian the starting quarterback for Week One, when the defending champions open the 2016 season with a rematch of Super Bowl 50....
docs.lead_paragraph: Denver Broncos coach Gary Kubiak has named Trevor Siemian the starting quarterback for Week One, when the defending champions open the 2016 season with a rematch of Super Bowl 50.

headline.main: Quarterback Siemian to Start for Broncos
headline.print_headline: Quarterback Siemian to Start for Broncos

docs.snippet: Frank McCourt, former owner of the Los Angeles Dodgers baseball team, said on Monday he had entered exclusive negotiations to buy Olympique de Marseille and vowed to restore the club to their former glories....

headline.main: Hamilton Says Alonso Retirement Is a Real Possibility
headline.print_headline: Hamilton Says Alonso Retirement Is a Real Possibility

docs.snippet: Start with the shoes but move on from there. That's the plan at Foot Locker Inc., long known for its sneakers, which is reorganizing its stores to further highlight top brands, designating areas to showcase trends, and adding more displays of full...
docs.lead_paragraph: Start with the shoes but move on from there. That's the plan at Foot Locker Inc., long known for its sneakers, which is reorganizing its stores to further highlight top brands, designating areas to showcase trends, and adding more displays of full sports gear to encourage broader shopping.

headline.main: Foot Locker Looks to Play Up the Store Experience
headline.print_headline: Foot Locker Looks to Play Up the Store Experience

docs.snippet: United States Ryder Cup captain Davis Love III says he will take a leaf out of 2008 skipper Paul Azinger's book before he announces his four wildcard picks for this year's competition against holders Europe....
docs.lead_paragraph: United States Ryder Cup captain Davis Love III says he will take a leaf out of 2008 skipper Paul Azinger's book before he announces his four wildcard picks for this year's competition against holders Europe.

headline.main: Love to Follow Azinger's Lead With Captain's Cup Picks
headline.print_headline: Love to Follow Azinger's Lead With Captain's Cup Picks

docs.snippet: The owners of the Minnesota Vikings failed in their bid to land a soccer team, losing out to the owners of the Minnesota United, of the North American Soccer League....
docs.lead_paragraph: The owners of the Minnesota Vikings failed in their bid to land a soccer team, losing out to the owners of the Minnesota United, of the North American Soccer League.
docs.abstract: Many soccer fans in Minnesota are relieved by news that Bill McGuire's ownership group has beaten out Wilf family, who own Minnesota Vikings, in bid for Minnesota United of MLS; part of success of bid by McGuire's group was promise to build open-air soccer-specific stadium with private money.

headline.main: Duel of Suitors Yields an M.L.S. Franchise for Minnesota
headline.print_headline: Duel of Suitors Yields a Franchise for Minnesota

docs.snippet: Eddie Jones, head coach of the England national rugby team, got into coaching almost by accident....
docs.lead_paragraph: Eddie Jones, head coach of the England national rugby team, got into coaching almost by accident.

docs.snippet: The junior world tennis rankings feature several successful Canadians, and Eugenie Bouchard and Milos Raonic have broken ground by reaching the Wimbledon final....
docs.lead_paragraph: The junior world tennis rankings feature several successful Canadians, and Eugenie Bouchard and Milos Raonic have broken ground by reaching the Wimbledon final.
docs.abstract: Canada is emerging as tennis powerhouse with sport fast becoming second most popular in country after ice hockey; junior rankings show evidence that interest in game has sped up in wake of number of Canadian players achieving top levels of profession.

headline.main: Canada, a Hockey Power, Is Embracing Tennis and Grand Slam Success
headline.print_headline: Breaking the Ice, Serve by Serve
